title: Swim in Rising Water
content:
On an N x N , each square  represents the elevation at that point .
Now rain starts to fall. At time , the depth of the water everywhere is . You can swim from a square to another 4-directionally adjacent square if and only if the elevation of both squares individually are at most . You can swim infinite distance in zero time. Of course, you must stay within the boundaries of the grid during your swim.
You start at the top left square . What is the least time until you can reach the bottom right square ?
